extendedInfo.description: Easiest way to remove unwanted apps from your android device and save storage space! Select multiple apps to uninstall. Change sort mode from main screen. Display app date info in elapsed time format. Features:* Uninstall multiple apps in single batch.* Display app name, size and date info.* Option to display app date info in elapsed time format.* Change sort mode from main screen with 1 click.* One click uninstall (can be turned off).* Buttons to clear selection and to reload installed apps.* Automatically cache installed apps for super-fast reloading.  * Context menu support (long click on app).* Display app version info (can be turned off).KWsmart app uninstall uninstaller app remove remover cleaner fast uninstaller quick uninstaller app batch uninstaller app market search

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Well Without Special Permissions and NO Ads
reviews.comment: Great to find an uninstaller that works as well as the other more popular ones but without unnecessary and intrusive permissions AND without any advertisements.  A great interface and it just works.  After it does the initial scan it caches the information so is very quick to use without needing to reload all the apps after every deletion.  For multiple deletion it moves smoothly from one to the next pausing for confirmation for each deletion - for me this extra step is good as it avoids accidentally removing more than you intended. (If you were removing dozens of apps each time it could be annoying but I can\'t imagine that most users need to frequently remove more than one or two apps at a time.)  For those complaining that it won\'t move pre-installed apps - unless you root your phone no current uninstaller can - blame Android for that not the App Developer.
reviews.author: Bob Morris

reviews.title: Rescans after every uninstall and Batch does not w
reviews.comment: Seems like I used to like this app... anad I can\'t remember if this ever really worked... but now when I use it, it takes 2+ minutes to scan 280 apps, I select 3 apps to uninstall and select \"Uninstall Selected\" it then ask me to confirm the first selected app... uninstalls it then rescans and forgets what I haad selected with only the (alphabetically) first app uninstalled... so wait 2 -3 minutes for it to RESCAN and try to uninstall another one... way slower that the stock uninstalled (Galaxy S)
